title.rendered: 6 Questions Every SaaS Reseller Should be Asking

content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1613681650078{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;padding-top: 180px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-image: url(https://wp.static-cdn-shsp.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/optimize_conversions_hero2.jpg?id=204773) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-bottom-color: #f5f5f5 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}” el_class=”overflow gradient-lt-dk-gray-with-ss-while-logo”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1583411856909{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”left-col-mob”][vc_column_text el_class=”m-b-0″ css=”.vc_custom_1613679668959{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”]

6 Questions Every SaaS Reseller Should be Asking

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1613680058875{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1588878863914{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”][easy-social-share buttons=”twitter,linkedin,facebook,mail” counters=0 style=”icon” template=”37″ size=”xs” point_type=”simple”][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ el_id=”passedEvent-column”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1525275406838{padding-top: 2% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1583364273895{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron” el_id=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]The top agencies reselling SaaS products know how to ask the right questions to make sure they’re positioned for growth.

That’s why in this exciting webinar session, business development and product leaders from PandaDoc and SharpSpring provide expert answers to key questions they hear most from agencies trying to improve their SaaS tool adoption and make their clients more successful. Check it out!

We tackle frequently-asked questions including:

  • How do I select which tools are the best for my clients?
  • Should I focus on commissions or build services into my pricing model?
  • How do I avoid selling a tool, just for the sake of selling a tool?
  • What are the most lucrative resellers doing with your products?
  • How do I become a “trust-agent” for my clients?
  • What ways do you incentivize resellers to work with your SaaS product?
  • And much more!

[/vc_column_text]

Your hosts:

William Hadeler

Partner Sales Manager, PandaDoc

William Hadeler is an experienced software sales professional with over 6 years of closing & business development experience. He currently manages PandaDoc's partnership sales channel. A few of his specialties include managing and closing mid-market & enterprise sales opportunities, full-cycle inbound sales, and channel sales and partner relationship management.

Nicholas Mangold

Product Marketing Specialist, SharpSpring

Nicholas Mangold is a Product Marketing Specialist at SharpSpring. Having previously served as a Senior Onboarding Specialist, he developed a wealth of first-hand knowledge on the implementation, strategy, and tactics that are key to growing your business with marketing automation.

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_video link=”https://vimeo.com/511304581/92fa05195b” align=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1617307297665{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}” el_class=”hidden”]
Trusted by more than 2,000 agencies

[vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”209119″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1625777412448{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1611176216542{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}” el_class=”m-t-minus-15-percent hide-cta” el_id=”register”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”stop”][vc_column][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”sticky-mobile-button”][vc_column]
